medical_history.chief_complaint: Initial development of dry cough and fever, leading to hospitalization for pneumonia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began with a dry cough and fever. The patient was initially treated with cough suppressants and clarithromycin without improvement. Upon re-evaluation, multiple pulmonary infiltrates were seen on chest imaging, leading to hospitalization. Condition progressed to respiratory failure, requiring transfer to another hospital for advanced treatment.
medical_history.social_history: Patient resides in Japan, with no significant mention of lifestyle factors, smoking history, or alcohol consumption.
